topics.body:
"@ArcticEight":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521934763687268e9bc0500#post_5521934763687268e9bc0500
I admit, I am biased toward Nintendo and Japanese media over most western media. Because those are what I grew up with.

I don't like rabid fanboys myself either. We all have our own degree of biases here. It's part of the programing within our nature. But to claim one side over another? That's just asking for conflicts. People have their own preferences.
